collection_holder_name: Arizona Historical Society/Southern Division, Library & Archives
pageContext.collection_description: Includes 11 scripts and a program list for the KVOA series Tales of Tucson, 1950-1951, with two additional scripts produced by Batten, Batten, Durstine and Osborn, Inc. Series concerns personalities, places and events in Tucson, including Preston N. Jacobus, Charles H. Meyer, Geronimo, the 1887 earthquake and the 1881 Halley's comet.
